data.name: Bardoon
data.value: Some caterpillar guy told me this, maybe you can comprehent what this means.

data.name: Bretta_Diary
data.value: This is a diary which I found on the street, seems to belong to some girl... No ehm, I didn't read it.

data.name: Cloth
data.value: Isn't she a very brave girl? Fear her roar!

data.name: Dreamer_Tablet
data.value: This tells the story of the sacrifice of the dreamers.

data.name: Dung_Defender
data.value: It's a gift with an extraordinary smell.

data.name: Elder_Hu
data.value: The mantis buried him even after he attacked them. How nice of them.

data.name: Emilitia
data.value: Just take it quick before she wants this back. She will probably pay 1000 times the amount it's worth. Nobody should think, she couldn't afford this, right?

data.name: Fluke_Hermit
data.value: The words spoken by the child of the A L L U R I N G mother

data.name: Fountain
data.value: There was no sign, that said, that I couldn't take this with me. At least, no sign I could read.

data.name: Galien
data.value: Something from an idiot who thought it would be a good idea to an area full a beasts. And then he died... \"Insert Surprised Pikachu Meme here\""

data.name: Godseeker
data.value: They found their god, in this shop. Not talking about you, of course.

data.name: Gorb
data.value: It's gorbin time! (to ascent!) (with Gorb) - Gorb

data.name: Grasshopper
data.value: Considering that these live in the garden, being an arsonist might not be the best for them.

data.name: Gravedigger
data.value: You might be thinking: Can't I just go outside and talk to him myself? Hey, if people buy water bottles, it was worth a shot.

data.name: Joni
data.value: The last words spoken by the heretic. Should probably cost more than 1000. Buy it now, before I change my mind.

data.name: Lemm_Sign
data.value: I didn't took this from the door... it fell to the ground and I decided I'd return it to him... later.

data.name: Marissa
data.value: From the most beautiful voice of the world besides me.

data.name: Markoth
data.value: Did the shade gate exists before he went in? If so, HOW could've he pass that? Is Markoth void? O.o

data.name: Marmu
data.value: They say the lore master creator hates this damn *****. Whatever that means.

data.name: Mask_Maker
data.value: From the creator of all those masks, these words shall extend your knowledge of the world.

data.name: Menderbug_Diary
data.value: Menderbug allowed me to take a look at their diary. What a kind heart bug. YOU'LL BE SORRY IF YOU TRY TO KILL THEM!

data.name: Midwife
data.value: Please just take this... I don't want this in my shop anymore...

data.name: Moss_Prophet
data.value: I'm not sure about this... just take it away.

data.name: Myla
data.value: From the best girl in hallownest. Don't even dare, to hurt her...

data.name: No_Eyes
data.value: I wonder what her name was before she... you know. If that's her real name, that is just asking for something to rip out your eyes.

data.name: Poggy
data.value: Want to know a secret? I've no clue who Poggy is.

data.name: Queen
data.value: The queen sent this through the kingdom for the day, someone like you arrives. How do I know? Well... don't ask.

data.name: Quirrel
data.value: The wisdom of a real adventurer, which can swim fairly good. :)

data.name: Record_Bela
data.value: A special lore tablet, which was hidden deep in Soul Sanctum.

data.name: Stag_Egg
data.value: My thoughts on a stag egg I found.

data.name: Tiso
data.value: Brooding Mawlek offered me this. I'm not sure what this could mean...

data.name: Traitor_Grave
data.value: Why are gravestones so damn expensive? Well the inscription isn't at least.

data.name: Vespa
data.value: A queen from a distant land tortured me with this. Let me share my pain with you.

data.name: Willoh
data.value: As a bug, I'd be scared of eating unknown mushrooms.

data.name: Xero
data.value: The words of the king, for what happens with traitors.

data.name: Zote
data.value: Ugh...
